TopicTitle: What's the worst thing to hear?

Articles.Content:
This was on the forums before they migrated to vBulletin

How to play:

Post your response to the last person's post and do another "What's the worst thing to hear while..."

I'll start:

What's the worst thing to hear while playing KSP and Minecraft at the same time?

Actually, There was an announcement that I didn't see that said that a large amount of info did not get taken to VB, but that was fixed about a week ago.

Edited August 20, 2012 by randomusername1

*Hssssssss*

*The sound of your ISS falling from the sky*

What's the worst thing to hear from Billy Mays? (RIP)

That's a very nice life you have there...

Worst thing from Jeb?

"I'm quite with my job."

....... when you kerbal's on the mun arch?

Getting eaten by the evil space kraken.

When your craft into a trajectory into the sun with no fuel left?

"I found a teleporter, but there's only one, and it's single use. Bye!"

from Kurt(jmac)?

"...A disastrous disaster of disastrous proportions"... as per

(SKIP TO 12:35)

...Two seconds before landing on the Mun?

Mum saying: "Honey, you're spaghetti is ready! Come down now or you're banned from the internet for a month!"

What's the worst thing to hear while you're on a plane?

"HOLY ****!"

(wait for iiiiiiit!)

...When you are in the shower?

The sound of you screaming because the water is freezing.

When .17 comes out?

... nothing happened...

What is the worst thing to hear when you are walking home from school, in a forest, in the middle of the night, in the arctic circle, wearing shorts and a tee-shirt?

The sound of of a hungry bear.

while playing What's the worst thing to hear??

Edited August 20, 2012 by randomusername1

"A new reply to this thread has been made. You may want to check your post."

While eating gold?

"A new reply to this thread has been made. You may want to check your post."

While eating gold?

Gold prices have skyrocketed! Right after you swallow it.

While making a part for Kerbal?

"Windows System32 files have been successfully deleted"

While ordering blue or purple flavoured ice cream?

'Hey Bill, someone just bought the blue stuff! They'll never know it was mould from a bin.' :chuckle:

While driving PANZERS?

EJECT EJECT EJECT... (those who use DGIV in Orbiter should know what I mean)

While trying to figure out how to use Blender and being too lazy too watch a tutorial vid:P?

wife says: Honey, what is this blender fo- AAARRRGGGG!!!!!!

*grinding sound*

What is the worst thing to hear while watching (don't ask me how I know about this show) "In the night garden"

"And then it became day."

While battling a Potato in the fight for your life, whilst orbiting an asteroid heading for the SUN?

"Not today."

When riding a magic carpet on the moon?

*Beep Beep Beep Beep* "Out Of Oxygen. Out Of Oxygen" *Beeeeeeeeeeep*

"No magic remaining" 

When operating an excavator in KSP while operating a real excavator? (Let's say the real excavator is a Liebherr R956, and the KSP excavator is a Kiebherr K956)
Someone else’s vomit.
